name: Women in AI Conference 2025
description: A global conference focused on empowering women in AI and machine learning. Join us for insightful talks and networking opportunities.

name: Career Reboot Bootcamp
description: A bootcamp for women looking to restart their careers in tech. Participate in workshops, resume building, and interview prep.

name: Tech Career Path Webinar
description: Join industry leaders for a webinar on navigating career paths in tech. A great opportunity for women to ask questions and get career advice.

name: Networking Meetup for Women in Tech
description: An in-person networking event for women in tech to meet mentors, peers, and potential employers. Don't miss out on connecting with like-minded professionals.

name: Women in Leadership Summit
description: A summit bringing together women leaders from various industries to discuss career growth, leadership, and empowerment in the workplace.
